fields.title: Open more than one instance of X

fields.body:
For Xorg:
$ xorgcfg --configure -textmode

For XFree86
$ xf86cfg --configure -textmode
fields.title: Configure X

fields.body:
rdesktop -u user host &
rdesktop -u user -g 1024x768 -s comando -T Windows -a 24 host
rdesktop -u user -g 1024x768 -s "C:\Arquivos de programas\programa.exe" -T Windows host
fields.title: Basic use of rdesktop

fields.body:
# ifconfig eth0 hw ether 00:11:22:33:44:55

in debian:
vim /etc/networks/interfaces
hwaddress ether 00:11:22:33:44:55
